document.full_text: asian football confederation (afc) chief mohamed bin hammam has rejected claims his candidacy for fifa president could split soccer's governing body and said saturday he expected a clean fight with sepp blatter.
document.title: my presidential push won't split fifa, says bin hammam
lines_and_colors: asian football confederation (afc) chief mohamed bin hammam has rejected claims his candidacy for fifa president could split soccer's governing body and said saturday he expected a clean fight with sepp blatter.
